original_text: Then Josiah contributed to the lay people, as Passover offerings for all who were present, lambs and young goats from the flock to the number of 30,000, and 3,000 bulls; these were from the king's possessions.
korean_text: 요시야가 그 모인 모든 이를 위하여 백성들에게 자기의 소유 양 떼 중에서 어린 양과 어린 염소 삼만 마리와 수소 삼천 마리를 내어 유월절 제물로 주매

sentences.original_text: Then Josiah contributed to the lay people
as Passover offerings for all who were present
sentences.korean_translation: 참석한 모든 사람을 위한 유월절 제물로서

sentences.original_text: lambs and young goats from the flock
sentences.korean_translation: 떼에서 나온 어린 양과 새끼 염소

sentences.original_text: these were from the king's possessions
